message: Let's start fair.  I'll take 60, you take 40.  We can work from there.
That's not a great starting point, Alice. How about a 55/45 split in my favor?  It's still a good deal before inflation really kicks in.
Okay, I'll move a little closer to your offer.  52/48 split feels fair to me.  Let's end this before the inflation hurts us both too much.
